column1: Little Goat Diner////One of my favorite breakfast spots when in the West Loop. Whether sit down breakfast/brunch or just swinging by for a fresh baked bagel (Grumpy Goat is the best!!) and coffee
column2: this place never disappoints. Their loaves of bread and cream cheeses are awesome to take home for company. Love love Little Goat!! Only downside is the parking in that area.
